title: Hour 1: Brooklyn Betrayal?
description:
Freddie Coleman, Courtney Cronin, and P.K Subban debate whether Kevin Durant should feel betrayed by Kyrie Irving after he gave a sign-and-trade wish list in case no deal with the Nets is done. The crew react to the Avalanche winning the Stanley Cup and discuss whether it is good for a small market team to do so. Mike Tannenbaum joins the show to debate if Baker Mayfield should return to the Browns.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
itunes:subtitle: First Take Hour 1: Should Durant feel betrayed by Kyrie?
